page.title: Fixed Deposit
page.tab:
The Fixed Deposit is specially designed for you to enjoy higher interest rates with your extra cash, and is available for a fixed period. Interest rates vary based on the selected period.

Key Features and benefits:

  • Certificate is provided at the time of account opening
  • Earn high return on your money

Tenure:

  • 1 month
  • 3 months
  • 6 months
  • 9 months
  • 12 months
  • 18 months

Eligibility:

  • You must be 18 years old or above
  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 1,000 for all terms exclude 18 months
  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 10,000 for 18 months term
  • This account is available to individual; non-individual, or joint account holders.

Document requirements for account opening:

  • Primary document:
    • Cambodia National Identification Card; or
    • Passport
  • Any two of the below secondary documents in case the primary document is not available:
    • Birth certificate
    • Resident book
    • Marriage certificate
    • Residential Certificate by an official authority
    • Family book with photo of head of family
    • Driving license issued by an official authority

One of the above secondary documents must have a holderâ€™s photograph e.g driving license and Birth certificate.
Please contact our staff for document requirements for non-individual account opening.
